sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的諮詢實踐中，我們改變了程序。

sentences.english: This paper presents a traditional Chinese medical expert consultation system named ZRK82.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一個名爲ZRK82的中醫專家諮詢系統。

sentences.english: Consult your legal counsel if you have any doubts about reusing content.
sentences.chinese: 若對重用內容有任何疑問，請諮詢您的法律顧問。

sentences.english: Tell your friends and relatives about Excellent's free mortgage referral and consulting services.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你的親友們有關卓譽的免費按揭轉介及諮詢服務。

sentences.english: Genetic counseling should be considered for individuals with a family history of albinism or hypopigmentation.
sentences.chinese: 遺傳諮詢應考慮個人與家族病史白化或色素缺失。

sentences.english: Information desk is at the gate, you can make a ask there.
sentences.chinese: 諮詢臺在門口，你可以去那裏問問。

sentences.english: Enterprise information for 20 years. Software(management) consulting soft-landing.
sentences.chinese: 企業信息化20年，軟件諮詢軟着陸。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyse the regularity of various chromosome anomalies among heredity inquires.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討各類遺傳諮詢者染色體核型異常發生規律。

sentences.english: OPENCASE is a professional business gifts company, one of the best business gifts companies in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 上海歐普凱商務諮詢有限公司是一家專業的禮品公司。

sentences.english: The letter added that counselling had been arranged for pupils and staff.
sentences.chinese: 信中說，已爲學生和教職員工安排了心理諮詢。

sentences.english: "So let's think of what empathy might have sounded like," said the counselor.
sentences.chinese: “所以我們想想共鳴應該是怎樣的，”諮詢師說。

sentences.english: See examples of theme gift baskets with expert gift giving advice in this free video clip.
sentences.chinese: 請看專家在此免費送禮視頻剪輯諮詢主題禮籃的例子。

sentences.english: Welcome all customers customized letter to inquire.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各方客戶來函來電諮詢定製。

sentences.english: The insult to the adult consulter results in multiplication of the faulty faucets.
sentences.chinese: 對成年諮詢者的侮辱導致有缺陷水龍頭成倍增加。

sentences.english: Excuse me. where can I find the information desk?
sentences.chinese: 打擾一下，那可以找到諮詢臺？

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我們請了一位稅務諮詢師，以便我們少交點稅。

definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
